questions.text: What is the color of the line that marks the route of the New York City marathon?
questions.explanation:
Blue.

	A marathon's distance was chosen to duplicate the distance run by a Greek soldier from the town of Marathon to Athens in 490BC. Over 30,000 runners compete in the New York City marathon.

questions.text: Name the stone whose name means 'sea water'.
questions.explanation:
Aquamarine.

	It is a gemstone that is a variety of the mineral beryl. It is blue, blue-green or green in color. The blue variety is the most valuable. It is found in Brazil, Siberia, Myanmar and parts of the United States.

questions.text: What is the color of the field of the Confederate battle flag?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	It had stars for 11 states and for secession governments in Kentucky and Missouri.

questions.text: What is the color of Mickey Mouse's gloves?
questions.explanation:
White.

	Mickey was originally to be named Mortimer but Mrs Disney felt it lacked charm. Near the end of Mickey's reformation gloves were introduced to make him more human.

Boston Blackie.

	Before he became a private eye the original Boston Black story had him as a hardened criminal serving time.

questions.text: Name the 1924 Charlie Chaplin film in which the hero attempts to eat his shoe.
questions.explanation:
Gold Rush.

	It pitted the "little tramp" against the Yukon.  All the highlights of a wonderful timeless comedy.

questions.text: Which is not a shade of blue?
questions.explanation:
Puce.

	Puce is a shade of red.

questions.text: Squirrels can have fur of several colors. Which of the following colors would you see the fewest of?
questions.explanation:
White.

	There are white ones but very rare.

questions.text: What color is the legendary unicorn?
questions.explanation:
White.

	It is said to have lived in India. It resembled a wild ass and had a white body, blue eyes and a single horn.

Green.

	Actually dark green. It is a flightless bird, second in size to the ostrich. It can run up to 50 kph. Normally lays 5 to 20 eggs.
